name: All Quiet on the Western Front (StallionStudios)
name_original: All Quiet on the Western Front (StallionStudios)
description:
A student game, made at the University of Utah!

You've been stuck in the same trench for the last three years now. You've survived every horror the maelstrom of war has thrown at you. 

Luckily for you, this will end up being the last day of the war that has claimed an uncountable number. Can you survive one last day? Or will the trenches consume you?
